name: AWS Rekognition
natural_language_description: 这是 AWS Rekognition 节点。主要用于: Sends data to AWS Rekognition

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: iam

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: image

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: analyze

type.name: type
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 默认值: detectFaces

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the image to analyze should be taken from binary field
binaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 作用: Whether the image to analyze should be taken from binary field | 默认值: False | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written | 默认值: data | (必填项)

bucket.name: bucket
bucket.natural_language_description: 参数名: Bucket | 作用: Name of the S3 bucket | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: S3 object key name | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: version (值: None) - If the bucket is versioning enabled, you can specify the object version
maxLabels (值: None) - Maximum number of labels you want the service to return in the response. The service returns the specified number of highest confidence labels.
minConfidence (值: None) - Specifies the minimum confidence level for the labels to return. Amazon Rekognition doesn't return any labels with a confidence level lower than this specified value.
attributes (值: None) - An array of facial attributes you want to be returned
